title: #260: Profiling The “Guru” and the Spiritual Warrior Deaths , Part 1
description:
Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti discuss the Wondery podcast "Guru" and break down the dark side of enlightenment. We discuss how someone with no qualifications or credentials can influence and manipulate so many as well as the enablers.


#HerNameWasKirbyBrown

#HerNameWasLizNeuman

#HisNameWasJamesShore
